name: Boneroom
description:
Boneroom is an ambient space operated by and for angels, loaded with bones and buttons for the celestial visitor to enjoy. 

Take your time, rest your wings, hang up your halo, and relax in the Boneroom.

This project features music by Soft and Furious for more: https://chezmonplaisir.bandcamp.com/

with bones from the 
Smithsonian Institution Digitization Program Office

Created by Oma Keeling. AfterglowGames. 2021.
